original_text: And stretching out his hand toward his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers!
korean_text: 손을 내밀어 제자들을 가리켜 이르시되 나의 어머니와 나의 동생들을 보라

sentences.original_text: And stretching out his hand toward his disciples
“Here are my mother and my brothers!
sentences.korean_translation: “보라, 나의 어머니와 나의 형제들이 여기 있다!
